error.signature: TS2748: Cannot access ambient const enums when 'isolatedModules' is enabled

verdict.summary: Const enums are erased at compile time and cannot work with isolatedModules (required by bundlers like Vite, esbuild).

dead_ends.action: Disable isolatedModules to fix the error
dead_ends.why_fails: Bundlers like esbuild and Vite require isolatedModules; disabling breaks the build tool

workarounds.action: Use regular enums instead of const enums
Use 'as const' objects instead of enums

leads_to.condition: When enum replacement changes the type signature

preceded_by.condition: When module system issues surface alongside enum problems

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Discriminated union is about type narrowing; const enum error is about compile-time erasure with isolatedModules
